content.question: All of the following characterize both perfectly competitive and monopolistically competitive markets EXCEPT:

choices.label: Price is equal to average revenue.
Individual firms produce output where marginal cost equals marginal revenue.
Firms can affect the selling price of their product.
The market has a large number of firms.
Firms can easily enter or exit the market.

content.answer: Firms can affect the selling price of their product.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
